snippet: Investors seemed to be more cautious this week as corporate earnings for the April-June period began trickling in.
abstract: Stocks stabilize, achieving tiny gains that fail to stave off market's biggest weekly drop since April.
lead_paragraph: Investors seemed to be more cautious this week as corporate earnings for the April-June period began trickling in.

headline.main: Market Steadies, but Slips for the Week
headline.print_headline: Market Steadies, but Slips for the Week
